array.string: The Emily Carr campus on Granville Island, a converted shipyard and urban park located in the middle of the city
The bike- and pedestrian-friendly seawall east of Granville Island: cherry blossoms in spring!
Looking north from Granville Island across False Creek into downtown: imagine taking the ferry to school each day.
Yes, those are palm trees! English Bay looking west to Stanley Park
Vancouver is bike friendly with several dedicated bike lanes
